title: Champ select freezing
body:
Anyone else have this happen? Has happened to me twice in 5 games now and I have bug reported it, just wondering if I'm the only one since I haven't seen any talk about it.

The champ select will randomly freeze - sounds will still play and when I hover over things the sounds work but I can not do anything once it's my turn to pick/ban and it forces me to dodge.
